tool.name: OTB.ConvertSensorToGeoPoint
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_output_idx $output_data_output_idx output_data_output_idy $output_data_output_idy output_data_output_town $output_data_output_town output_data_output_country $output_data_output_country name OTB.ConvertSensorToGeoPoint in $in input_idx $input_idx input_idy $input_idy prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_output_idx $OutputSection_output_idx.transmissionMode_output_idx transmissionMode_output_idy $OutputSection_output_idy.transmissionMode_output_idy transmissionMode_output_town $OutputSection_output_town.transmissionMode_output_town transmissionMode_output_country $OutputSection_output_country.transmissionMode_output_country

param.name: in
param.label: Input sensor image.
param.help: Input sensor image. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: input_idx
param.label: X coordinate of the point to transform.
param.help: X coordinate of the point to transform.

param.name: input_idy
param.label: Y coordinate of the point to transform.
param.help: Y coordinate of the point to transform.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_output_idx
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This Application converts a sensor point of an input image to a geographic point using the Forward Sensor Model of the input image.
